text: Kim Young-ok (; born December 5, 1937) is a South Korean actress who debuted in 1957. She is known as South Korea's "National Grandma" for her many portrayals of grandmothers in film and television. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:670px" |- ! width=10|Year !
